ta\ e)k th=s a)pousi/as mei/zwn tw=n e)k th=s tou= puro\s gi/gnetai parousi/as diafora/. futa\ me\n ga\r kai\ karpou\s ou)x h( u(gro/ths a)nadi/dwsin a)ll' h( qermh\ u(gro/ths: a)me/lei ta\  yuxra\ tw=n u(da/twn h(=tton h)\ ou)d' o(/lws go/nima. kai/toi g' ei) th=| au(tou= fu/sei to\

u(/dwr karpofo/ron, dei= pa/ntote kai\ kaq' au(to\

                   a)nafe/rein karpou/s: to\ de\ tou)nanti/on kai\ blabero/n e)stin.

a)p' a)/llhs a)rxh=s. pro\s me\n th\n puro\s
w(s puro\s xrh=sin u(/datos ou) prosdeo/meqa, a)lla\
 tou)nanti/on e)mpodw\n gi/gnetai katasbe/nnusi ga\r kai\ diafqei/rei. u(/datos de\ toi=s plei/stois xrh=sis
ou)k e)/stin a)/neu puro/s: qermanqe\n ga\r w(felimw/teron,
ou(/tw de\ blabero/n. w(/ste duei=n a)/meinon o(\ a)f' e(autou= pare/xetai xrei/an, tou= e(te/rou mh\ prosdeo/menon.
 e)/ti u(/dwr me\n monaxw=s w)fe/limon kata\ qi/cin lousame/nois h)\ niyame/nois, to\ de\ pu=r dia\ pa/shs ai)sqh/sews: kai\ ga\r dia\ th=s a(fh=s kai\ po/rrwqen o(rw/menon, w(/ste prosei=nai toi=s a)/llois th=s
 xrei/as au)tou= kai\ th\n polute/leian.

to\ ga\r le/gein w(s e)/sti pote\ o( a)/nqrwpos a)/neu puro\s ou)d' o(/lws du/natai gene/sqai o( a)/nqrwpos. diaforai\ d' ei)si\n e)n ge/nei kaqa/per kai\
e)n a)/llois. kai\ th\n qa/lattan h( qermo/ths w)felimwte/ran e)poi/hsen, w(s ma=llon kataqerh= tw=n u(da/twn,
 e)pei\ kat' au(to/ ge tw=n loipw=n ou)de\n die/fere. kai\
oi( mh\ prosdeo/menoi de\ tou= e)/cwqen puro\s ou)x w(s a)prosdeei=s tou=to pa/sxousin, a)lla\ periousi/a| kai\ pleonasmw=| tou= e)n au(toi=s qermou=: w(/ste kai\ kata\
 tou=q' u(pere/xein th\n tou= puro\s xrei/an, w(s ei)ko/s.
to\ me\n u(/dwr ou)de/pote toiou=ton, w(/ste mh\ dei=sqai
 tw=n e)kto/s, to\ de\ pu=r u(p' a)reth=s pollh=s kai\ au)/tarkes,
w(s ou)=n strathgo\s a)mei/nwn o( paraskeua/sas
 th\n po/lin mh\ dei=sqai tw=n e)/cwqen summa/xwn, ou(/tw kai\ stoixei=on to\ th=s e)/cwqen e)pikouri/as pare/xon polla/kis mh\ deo/menon u(pere/xon. tou=to r(hte/on kai\ peri\ tw=n a)/llwn zw/|wn, o(/sa mh\ puro\s dei=tai. kai/toi
g' ei)s tou)nanti/on la/boi tis a)/n, to\ xrhsimw/teron
 ei)=nai tou=to, w(=| xrw/meqa mo/noi oi( kai\ ma/lista
to\ be/ltion e)k logismou= labei=n duna/menoi: e)pei\ ti/ lo/gou xrhsimw/teron h)\ ma=llon a)nqrw/pois lusitele/steron;
 a)ll' ou) pa/resti toi=s a)lo/gois.

ei) toi/nun tou= zh=n ou)de

kai\ mh/n, ou(= plei/stou kra=sis th=s tw=n ai)sqh/sewn metei/lhfen, ou)k a)\n ei)/h lusitele/staton; ou)x

o(ra=|s ou)=n, w(s th=| me\n u(gra=| fu/sei ou)demi/a tw=n ai)sqh/sewn kat' au(th\n prosxrh=tai xwri\s pneu/matos
h)\ puro\s e)gkekrame/nou, tou= de\ puro\s a(/pasa me\n
ai)/sqhsis, oi(=on to\ zwtiko\n e)nergazome/nou, metei/lhfen,
e)caire/tws d'  h( o)/yis, h(\tis o)cuta/th tw=n dia\

sw/mato/s e)stin ai)sqh/sewn, puro\s e)/camma ou)=sa kai\ o(/ti qew=n pi/stin pare/sxhken e)/ti te, *pla/twn fhsi/, duna/meqa katasxhmati/zein pro\s ta\s tw=n e)n ou)ranw=| kinh/seis th\n yuxh\n dia\ th=s o)/yews;
